name: 1forestrpg
description:
This is my entry for the 1roomrpg gamejam.

Controls: use wasd or arrows to move. enter to pick up items and use sword.

The idea was to use a relatively common puzzle in jrpg and imagine a game from that (it's very unpolished right now though).

My entry is not exactly about a room but a forest... Technically it's still one room!
